errorDoubleRun.title: Account Already Running
errorDoubleRun.body: An account {{running_konnector}} is already running. You cannot run two accounts simultaneously. Please wait for the {{running_konnector}} account execution to end before launching your {{concurrent_konnector}} account

errors.badUnlockPassword: The credentials you entered are incorrect, please try again.
errors.badUnlockPin: The PIN you entered is incorrect, please try again
errors.contactUs: A problem, a suggestion? Contact us at
errors.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred, please try again.
errors.platformNotSupported: Platform not supported for this request
errors.serverError: An error occurred while processing your request
errors.cacheCheckError: An error occurred while processing your request
errors.print: Failed to print, please try again.
errors.shareFiles_other: We couldn't share your files, please try again.
errors.shareFiles_interval: (1)[We couldn't share your file, please try again.]||||(2-inf)[We couldn't share your files, please try again.]

logout_dialog.content: Are you sure you want to logout from your Cozy?
logout_dialog.title: Logout

cozyBlocked.body: Contact us, if you want to know more, at contact@cozycloud.cc.
cozyBlocked.title: Your Cozy has been blocked

cozyNotFound.body: We could not find any Cozy at this address. It may be a typo. To know, check the address of your Cozy in the email we sent you when it was created.
cozyNotFound.title: This Cozy address does not exist.

cozyNotOnboarded.body: You must click on the email sent at the end of your registration to complete it. If you can't find this email, please contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc.
cozyNotOnboarded.title: You have not completed your registration

managerError.body: An error occurred while processing your login link
managerError.title: A problem occurred

lock.promptSubtitle: Use your biometric fingerprint to authenticate
lock.title: Enter your password

SecureScreen.passwordprompt_body: Access to your device is not secure. Choose a password to secure access to your Cozy.
SecureScreen.pinprompt_body: Access your app faster by enabling app unlock with PIN code
SecureScreen.pinsave_step1_body: Set your PIN to unlock the app after a period of inactivity.
SecureScreen.pinsave_step2_body: For security, please re-enter the chosen PIN.

login.invalidMagicCode: The link to access your Cozy is truncated or has expired

offline.body: Check your internet connection to access your Cozy.
offline.title: No internet connection

welcome.body: Access your Personal Cloud now, the digital home to gather all your data
welcome.buttonLogin: I already have a Personal Cloud
welcome.title: Personal Cloud

notifications.backupSuccessBody_other: Your backup is complete! {{backedUpMediaCount}}/{{count}} saved items
notifications.backupSuccessBody_plural: Your backup is complete! {{backedUpMediaCount}}/{{count}} saved items

notifications.backupPartialSuccessBody_other: Your backup is stopped! {{backedUpMediaCount}}/{{count}} saved items
notifications.backupPartialSuccessBody_plural: Your backup is stopped! {{backedUpMediaCount}}/{{count}} saved items
notifications.backupErrorBody: Your backup encountered an error. Open the app to see more details

geolocationTracking.androidNotificationDescription: Your journey will be recorded into your Cozy
geolocationTracking.quotaExceededNotificationDescription: You have reached the limit of {{days}} days of journeys included in your offer.

disableReasons.multipleFiles: Adding multiple items at the same time is not yet possible. Please select a single item to continue.
disableReasons.tooManyFiles: The number of files ({{numberOfFiles}}) is too large for {{appname}} (max: {{maxNumberOfFiles}}).
disableReasons.incompatibleMime: The file type(s) are not compatible with {{appname}}.
disableReasons.tooLargeFiles: The file(s) are too big to be transferred to {{appname}}.

ErrorToken.title: Access Revoked
ErrorToken.body: It seems you have revoked this device from your Cozy. To access your data again, please log in again. If you did not perform this action, please feel free to contact us at <linkTag>{{email}}</linkTag>.

IconChangedModal.description: The icon of the 'Cozy' application has been modified.
